fullText:
Censure’s Grip

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, avenger, Censure of Pursuit class feature, oath of enmity power
Benefit: When you have combat advantage against your oath of enmity target and hit it with an avenger power, your target cannot shift away from you until the end of your next turn.

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 137.
name: Censure’s Grip
